question:
Identify the personality with the help of given information:
  1. He was a Hindu theologian & philosopher and one of the most important exponents of the Sri Vaishnavism tradition.
  2. He is famous as the chief proponent of Vishishtadvaita sub-school of Vedanta
  3. He wrote influential texts such as Bhasya on the Brahma Sutras and the Bhagavad Gita
  4. In May 2017, the 1000th birth anniversary of this saint was observed
Select the correct answer from options given below:
explanation: Ramanuja was a Hindu theologian & philosopher and one of the most important exponents of the Sri Vaishnavism tradition. His philosophical foundation was qualified monism and is called Vishishtadvaita. He is also known for writing influential texts such as Bhasya on the Brahma Sutras and the Bhagavad Gita. Ramanuja\'s Vishishtadvaita School and Shankara\'s Advaita School are both nondualism Vedanta schools. The 1000th birth anniversary of this Vaishnavite saint was celebrated in May 2017.
